name: Bruno Cesar
message: I’ve started training Jiu Jitsu here a few weeks ago and couldn’t be happier of my choice. I had never done BJJ before and the beginner classes are great and give me the necessary information and practice to progress my techniques. The environment is amazing too. Everyone is kind, respectful and always ready to help. I really recommend this place if you are thinking about start practicing Brazilian Jiu Jitsu. #OSS

name: Kamila Duranti
message: As a woman, I was initially hesitant to try BJJ, but the Women's Only classes at Athlete A have been amazing. The instructors are patient and encouraging, and I've made great friends here.

name: Taiane Vieira da Silva
message: I was welcomed by a warm and supportive community, providing me with the opportunity to learn numerous techniques and enhance my skills under the guidance of dedicated and passionate instructors. I've formed genuine friendships with amazing people who share my passion for the sport. This place is more than just a gym; it's an environment where you can grow not only as a fighter but also as a person. I wholeheartedly recommend it to anyone looking to engage in this wonderful sport and be part of a truly special community!

name: Joao Viana
message: Since my first day at the trial , everybody was super friendly and helpful. Adriano the professor is amazing , calm to teach and easy going . Nice and clean structure.

name: Brian O'Regan
message: Great place to learn Jiu-jitsu, Adriano is very patient and all the more experienced guys take time to show the the fundamentals.. I am grateful for all the valuable lessons I've learned here, not just about jiu-jitsu but also about life.

name: James Doran
message: Great gym. Spotlessly clean, knowledgable instructors, and friendly environment.
